cycleTracking.title: Complete Cycle Tracking

cycleTracking.completeTrackingDesc: Record period, flow, physical and emotional symptoms in detail

cycleTracking.patternsAndPredictionsDesc: AI identifies trends and predicts next periods and symptoms
cycleTracking.lutealAdvice: Decreased energy, prioritize rest and nutritious foods
cycleTracking.follicularAdvice: In {{days}} days, renewed energy for new projects
cycleTracking.physicalSymptomsDesc: Record cramps, headaches, acne and other symptoms
cycleTracking.moodAndEnergyDesc: Monitor your emotional state and energy levels
cycleTracking.sleepQualityDesc: Track sleep patterns and discover impacts on well-being
cycleTracking.consciousNutritionDesc: Record meals and receive personalized guidance

aiAssistant.title: Contextual AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: A 24/7 personal coach that understands your cycle, mood, sleep and goals to offer personalized recommendations
aiAssistant.sampleQuestion: I've been feeling tired lately, what can I do?
aiAssistant.sampleAnswer: I noticed you're in the luteal phase and your sleep has been irregular. I recommend: sleep 30min earlier today, a light 15min outdoor walk and chamomile tea at night. ðŸŒ™

aiAssistant.privateDesc: Your conversations are encrypted and never shared
aiAssistant.dailyMicroActionsDesc: Simple and quick suggestions adapted to your cycle phase
aiAssistant.weeklyReportsDesc: Automatic analyses of your patterns and progress
aiAssistant.emotionalSupportDesc: Guidance to manage stress, anxiety and emotional challenges

pricing.faqA1: Yes! If you upgrade, you'll have immediate access to Premium features. If you downgrade, Premium features will remain until the end of the paid period.
pricing.faqQ2: How does the free trial work?
pricing.faqA2: You have 7 days of full access to Premium features at no cost. Cancel before the trial period ends and you won't be charged. No credit card required to start.
pricing.faqA3: Your data remains saved and you keep access to free features. You can reactivate Premium anytime and continue where you left off. Your insights and history won't be lost.
pricing.faqA4: Yes! Your data is encrypted and securely stored. You have full control over your information and can export or delete your data anytime. We never share or sell your personal information.
pricing.ctaJoin: Join thousands of women who are already taking better care of themselves with Luna.
